description: A powerful multi-functional WhatsApp bot with AI features, group moderation, media tools, and 250+ commands. Built with gifted-baileys.

SESSION_ID.description: Your session ID. Get one at https://silva-session-selector.vercel.app/

OWNERS.description: Owner phone numbers separated by semicolons (e.g., 254743706010;Silva MD Bot)

BOTNAME.description: Give your bot a display name

MODE.description: Bot mode: public (responds to everyone) or private (owner only)

PREFIX.description: Command prefix symbol (e.g., . or ! or #). Leave blank for multi-prefix

PORT.description: Server port for the landing page

AUTO_STATUS_LIKE.description: Auto-like WhatsApp statuses with an emoji (true/false)

AUTO_STATUS_LIKE_EMOJI.description: Emoji used to react to statuses

Status_Saver.description: Forward viewed statuses to bot owner (true/false)

STATUS_REPLY.description: Auto-reply to people who post statuses (true/false)

STATUS_MSG.description: Custom message sent as status reply
STATUS_MSG.value: SILVA MD BOT SUCCESSFULLY VIEWED YOUR STATUS ðŸ’–ðŸ’š

WELCOME_MSG.description: Send welcome message when someone joins a group (true/false)

GOODBYE_MSG.description: Send goodbye message when someone leaves a group (true/false)

ANTILINK.description: Auto-delete group links sent in groups when bot is admin (true/false)

antidelete.description: Forward deleted messages to bot owner (true/false)

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Show recording status when processing commands (true/false)

AUTO_TYPING.description: Show typing status when processing commands (true/false)

ANTIVIEWONCE.description: Forward view-once messages so they can be seen again (true/false)

REMOVEBG_KEY.description: API key for remove.bg background removal (get at https://www.remove.bg/api)
